name: aeroflow
description: Truly lazily computed reactive data flows with rich set of pure functional operators and async support.
keywords: ES6, fluent, async, reactive, functional, FRP, LINQ
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run document
scripts.babel: npm run babel:library && npm run babel:tests
scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run babel && npm run uglify
scripts.build:library: npm run rollup:library && npm run rollup:library:modern && npm run babel:library && npm run uglify
scripts.build:tests: npm run rollup:tests && npm run rollup:tests:modern && npm run babel:tests
scripts.document: npm run jsdoc2md && npm run mocha:specs
scripts.jsdoc2md: node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md build/modern/aeroflow.js > documentation/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format grouped --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.lint: npm run lint:library && npm run lint:tests
scripts.rollup: npm run rollup:library && npm run rollup:library:modern && npm run rollup:tests && npm run rollup:tests:modern
scripts.test: npm run mocha:tests && npm run isparta
